rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Allow me to recap our strategy,
not that there's too much to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0020
rows.name:
We'll deploy units around the White Whale 2
to serve as escort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0030
rows.name: Then we plot a course—straight for the enemy stronghold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0040
rows.name: Thereafter, the raiding party will deploy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0050
rows.name: Waste no time—make a beeline for Void and eliminate him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0060
rows.name: Return the cores to the Ares, then return to the flagship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0070
rows.name: We spool up the drive, and jump away from Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0080
rows.name:
During the assault, the Whale will serve as the forward
operating base, and provide support to all units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0090
rows.name: The escort will remain in place at all times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0100
rows.name: This concludes the briefing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0110
rows.name: We're really going for the jugular, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0120
rows.name: What, you wanna stay put?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0125
rows.name: I don't fancy getting dematerialized, myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0130
rows.name:
At least the ship will be close at hand
when we're flying back with the cores.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0140
rows.name: It's like two birds in the hand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0150
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0160
rows.name: Awful risky, but it's a solid plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0170
rows.name:
Thank the Director General.
This one is very much his brainchild.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0180
rows.name: As you realize, this strategy puts civilians in danger, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0190
rows.name:
Still, he canvassed the representatives of each race
ahead of time, and convinced them to sign off on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0200
rows.name:
Even Mamapon!
She also sweet-talked by Big Man Maurice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0210
rows.name: She say he make chest swell and tears well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0220
rows.name: Director General... Thank you very much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0230
rows.name: Not at all, just doing my job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0240
rows.name: Then why cheeks all blushy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0250
rows.name: Lastly, about the top-level command for this operation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0260
rows.name: Vandham will be in charge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0270
rows.name: You take it from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0280
rows.name: Right, well, that should give you an idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0290
rows.name: Listen up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0300
rows.name:
You misfits are the raiding party.
Yeah, I know, surprise surprise, shock horror, whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0310
rows.name:
We've considered your past performance,
and could find no better candidates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0320
rows.name:
Anyone who wants out,
you're free to leave the room at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0330
rows.name: ...Good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0340
rows.name: The unit's leader will be Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0350
rows.name: Got it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0360
rows.name: No complaints.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0370
rows.name: Yes, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0380
rows.name: Next, the escort unit's leader...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0390
rows.name: That's Ga Buidhe, commanding the Wrothian military.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0400
rows.name:
Finally, support for the troops aboard this ship—
that will be aided by a Ma-non representative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0410
rows.name: It will be a collective effort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0420
rows.name: Pleasure's all mine, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0430
rows.name: That's that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0440
rows.name: There's still some time before you sortie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0450
rows.name: Take some time as needed, just don't lose your focus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0460
rows.name: Dismissed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33090100_MSG0470
rows.name: Sir![ST:wait ]
